title: Played since beta, may leave the game forever. But for a different reason
body:
I have played this game since the beginning, And i've seen the ups and downs of the league.

I'm very stressed out because Shen is being reworked, and i'm ripping my hair out because Shen is the only part of the game that i truly enjoy.

People claimed he was useless , saying half his kit was useless and he doesn't match up to champions like Fiora or Riven etc
But the problem isn't Shen. it is the people who are playing him very wrong.

Ive played Shen since he was released, and i have amazed people with the way i play Shen, proving he is a very viable champion.

Typical Shen scenario:

Shen uses stand united, Shen then uses shadow dash. The enemy then says, meh its just Shen and they leave him till last and deal with him after they have killed every one else.

The reason this happens, is because people build Shen like this{{item:3111}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3078}} 

And it doesn't work. it really doesn't.

Why?

Because Shen is not a full tank. He isn't your typical tank, He is a fighter/bruiser who plays out as an assassin, he is a very flexible character

This is how i play Shen. {{champion:98}} 

Build:{{item:1300}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3091}} {{item:3742}}  Sometimes a {{item:3156}}  if the team is very heavy ap.

My runes: 
3x Greater Quintessence of Energy Regeneration.
9x Greater mark of attack speed.
9x Greater seal of armor.
9x Greater Glyph of magic resist

In total that grants

15.28% Attack Speed
+9 Armor
+12.06 Magic resist
+4.7 Energy regen/5

Masteries: 
18/0/12
FEROCITY:                                                                                   RESOLVE:
Fury                                                                                              Unyielding
Double edged sword                                                                  Tough Skin
natural talent                                                                              Veterans Scars 
oppressor                                                                                    Insight
battering blows
deathfire touch

Summoner Spells: Ignite / Ghost

Explanation of his kit.

Ki Strike is a symbolic ability of Shen. the sound of his ki strike being ready, the glowing of the hands, top it off with a titanic hydra and even a dead mans plate and it will cause massive damage. Using the titanic hydras active ability immediately after using ki strike will cause an auto attack reset which deals incredible damage and shaves off the cooldown on ki strike.

Vorpal blade is another symbolic ability of Shen, with a low cooldown, it provides a life tap that allows you to sustain yourself while dealing serious damage.
This is a very important dueling ability and can be used defensively and offensively.

Feint is the ability most questioned. People say its useless since its a small shield... But is it useless? No. Far from it.
In fact its very different from most shields in the game. its not a shield that you can pop and say look at me im tough and dont take any damge (looking at you {{champion:111}}  :P ) In fact feint is a situational shield, it is useful for avoiding something serious at the precise time.
And heres the interesting part. Its all part of his strong trading phase.

Shadow dash, follow up with vorpal blade attack with ki strike which engages the heal, on top of that you are taking 50% reduced damage , and you have feint on top of that. suddenly that little shield isnt so useless after all.
It can also be used at the right time to shave off a few seconds of Ki strike.

Stand united, either used to save someones life, or to bring an unstoppable gank. Communication is everything with this ability, Many times i tell my adc to walk into the brush, i teleport to him and then jump out, and surprise the enemy. Or use it on top of a {{champion:54}}  Ult (ouch!)

Using this setup will allow you to be very durable , and still benefit from low cooldown, the energy regen is very helpful and allows you to always be able to use whatever ability you need.
The damage you will deal is absolutely incredible.

But heres the fun part. what lane do i use this setup in? believe it or not.. Middle lane!

Shens abilities are perfect for mid, and they are great against the usual mid laners, Shen counters just about any champion if played right.
(Example, Shen counters Yasuo extremely well, Shadow dash through yasuo which will pop yasuos passive shield, follow up with vorpal blade and ki strike and pop feint to avoid the damage due to 50% damage reduction from shadow dash and more with the shield.
Shen also counters Zed,Leblanc,Ekko,Kassadin,Veigar,Azir and just about anyone else you can think of.

Its important to note that vorpal blade is weak on rank one, but as soon as you hit rank 2, you're good to go, that gives you plenty of time to focus on last hitting minions with vorpal blade and ki strike before being offensive and jumping your opponent. 

You will be able to jump the back line of a team fight and kill the adc before your taunt even wears off. Yes you will do that much damage.

You will topple champions like Fiora, riven,Olaf, anyone who hits really hard, you will hit harder and outlast them. you will inflict huge damage in team fights. 

I have played Shen since his release, and ive bonded  with him, he is my favourite champion, in fact he is one of my all time favourite video game characters. and i cringe whenever i see someone playing him wrong then saying how bad he is, simply because they are playing him wrong.

Shen suffers from misunderstanding more then anything. And surprisingly enough he has a fair learning curve.

But please try the above. I have many screenshots and video of my gameplay as Shen. Including pentakills and everything.

I have played this game for so long, i have seen things go up and down, and the community has sadly become very horrible i suffer from severe depression and have even been reduced to tears from some of the hurtful things people can say, and even though riot has done a great job trying to clean up the community and make it a happy and friendly place, it still has a long way to go.Lately there have been changes that i havent yet decided whether i like them or not, Some changes have severely affected my gameplay. But the entire time ive played this game i have always said to my friends, as long as i can play shen the way i always have throughout the years, im happy, but if he ever gets changed into something that i dont like i will most likely leave the game for good.

Lately ive been super stressed about this rework, i have  seen some of the changes made to the game and im very scared what could happen to shen.

I have been playing games worse lately because im so scared of what is going to happen to Shen, and i may end up Leaving this game for good if he is changed so much that i cant play him the same way. And it may sound silly, but i would actually be very heartbroken.

Thankyou to everyone that has taken the time to read what i wrote, i dont know if this will spark positive or negative feedback, but i just felt the need to speak my mind and express myself, and i do feel a little relieved having done so.

I do hope you all have fun with the snowdown event :) and i hope you have positive games and a very merry christmas!
